statements: INSERT INTO company_policies (policy_title, policy_content) VALUES ('Employee Handbook', 'This handbook contains all the policies and procedures for employees.');
INSERT INTO company_policies (policy_title, policy_content) VALUES ('Code of Conduct', 'Our code of conduct outlines the behavior expected from all employees.');

INSERT INTO company_policies (policy_title, policy_content) VALUES ('Equal Opportunity Policy', 'We are committed to providing equal opportunities for all employees.');
INSERT INTO company_policies (policy_title, policy_content) VALUES ('Data Privacy Policy', 'Protecting the privacy of our employees and customers is essential to us.');
